ping.description: Displays the current latency between the server (Discord⇔BOT).

button.time_out:
❌ Timed out. Please try again.
To play again, use **\`/slot\`**.
button.invalid_user:
❌ Only the command user can use these buttons.
To play yourself, use **\`/slot\`**.

message_del.description: Delete a specified number of messages in the current channel.

emoji.action: Action to perform on emoji (default: create)
emoji.url: URL for the emoji (required for create/update)
emoji.name: Name of the emoji

wildrift.description: Display up to 10 latest news items from the Wild Rift official page.
wildrift.count: Specify the number of news items to display.

random.description: TESTING: Randomly divide members in the specified VC into teams. (This command is in testing)
random.vc_channel: Voice channel to divide teams (default: your current VC)

fetch.not_available: ❌ You do not have permission to use this command.
fetch.error: ❌ An error occurred during data update.
fetch.check: Please check the logs for details.

emoji.exists: ❌ Emoji `{{emojiName}}` already exists. Here it is: {{existingEmoji}}
emoji.invalid_action: ❌ Invalid action : {{action}}. Please choose from `create`, `update`, or `delete`.
emoji.check: Please check the logs for details.
